diff_act: 1.determine the most suitable host for job execution
2.place the job in its queue for execution

regen.absent_element: determination of the most suitable queue for job execution on the selected host
regen.new_specification: The Libra shall determine the most suitable queue for the job on the chosen host based on factors such as queue priority and availability of required resources.
The scheduler shall select a suitable queue on the chosen host based on the job's requirements and priority before inserting it into the queue for execution.
The scheduler shall select a suitable queue on the chosen host for the job to join the competition for resources.

label: After the host is determined, the Libra shall select the appropriate queue based on the job parameter.
absence: the selection of the appropriate queue after the host is determined
